I am a self proclaimed web-designer with a passion to make every site more comfortable for me to use. I also have my own website that I have made from scratch, with my own hands. No Bootstrap, no templates, only me, my text editor and my trusty CSS textbook. 

My styles are all Public Domain because it's not like I own the CSS of the website anyway. Feel free to throw some pennies my way though, that's always appreciated!
